types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: ID
types.description: Mongo ID. Value must be represented as a valid ObjectId

types.name: Date
types.description: ISO Date. Value must be represented as a valid Date

types.name: Price
types.description: Price value. Value must be represented as nonnegative Integer between 0 and 1_000_000_000

types.name: String
types.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

fields.name: type
fields.description: SYSTEM type message don't have a sender/recipient, because it relates only to chat

types.name: ClientAppointment
types.description: This type of entity is for HEALER_CLIENT users

types.name: Float
types.description: The `Float` scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional values as specified by [IEEE 754](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).

types.name: HealerAppointment
types.description: This type of entity is for HEALER users

fields.name: createHealerPaypalConnectLink
fields.description:
Creates an url for onboarding healer to paypal Connect

Can throw errors: "UNAUTHORIZED"

fields.name: createHealerStripeConnectLink
fields.description:
Creates an url for onboarding healer to stripe Connect

Can throw errors: "UNAUTHORIZED"

fields.name: createAgoraTokens
fields.description:
Returns a video call info for upcoming CONFIRMED appointment (should be <= 5 minutes to start)

Suitable for both roles, with appointment id from each (client or healer)

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: confirmForgotPassword
fields.description:
Confirms and updates password through forgot password flow

Can throw error codes: 'BAD_USER_INPUT', 'INCORRECT_VERIFICATION_CODE'

fields.name: login
fields.description:
Logs user in and creates a new session

Can throw error codes: 'EMAIL_IS_NOT_CONFIRMED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT', 'INCORRECT_CREDENTIALS_OR_USER_NOT_EXISTS'

fields.name: loginGoogle
fields.description:
Logs user in by google credentials and creates a new session

Can throw error codes: 'BAD_USER_INPUT', 'INCORRECT_CREDENTIALS_OR_USER_NOT_EXISTS'

fields.name: refreshSession
fields.description:
Refreshes current session. Access token should be in 'Authorization' header

Can throw error codes: 'REFRESH_TOKEN_ERROR'

fields.name: resendSignUpEmailVerification
fields.description:
Send a new code to provided email for sign up. Can be send only once per minute

Can throw error codes: 'REFRESH_TOKEN_ERROR', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

Default code on dev environment is '111111'

fields.name: sendForgotPasswordEmail
fields.description:
Send a code to provided email for forgot password change. Can be send only once per minute

Can throw error codes: 'VERIFICATION_CODE_EXISTS', 'BAD_USER_INPUT', 'EMAIL_IS_NOT_CONFIRMED_WHEN_FORGOT_PASSWORD'

Default code on dev environment is '777777'

fields.name: signUp
fields.description:
Saves sign up information and sends verification code to email

Can throw error codes: 'EMAIL_EXISTS', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

Default code on dev environment is '000000'

fields.name: signUpGoogle
fields.description:
Saves sign up google information

Can throw error codes: 'EMAIL_EXISTS', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: verifySignUpEmail
fields.description:
Verifies user email

Can throw error codes: 'INCORRECT_VERIFICATION_CODE', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: readChatMessages
fields.description:
Mark all provided ids messages as read by authorized user

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: sendChatMessage
fields.description:
Sends a message to the users chat. If chat is not exists - creates it

Chats allowed only for opposite roles

Also publish an update to MessageCreated subscription

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: cancelClientAppointment
fields.description:
Cancels NOT Canceled client appointment

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: createClientAppointment
fields.description:
Creates an order, which client should to finish (pay), then client appointment will created with provided time. For now order can be verified through /verify-payment endpoint with POST { orderId } body

Time should be from response, which calculate available slots, include exact date/timezone

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT', 'SERVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_BOOKING', 'SERVICE_ALREADY_BOOKED_BY_THIS_USER'

fields.name: rescheduleAppointment
fields.description:
Reschedules PRIVATE and NOT Canceled client appointment to selected time

Reschedule availability can be checked in corresponding query

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED' | 'NOT_AVAILABLE_TO_RESCHEDULE'

fields.name: cancelHealerAppointment
fields.description:
Cancels CONFIRM'ed healer appointment

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: completeHealerAppointment
fields.description:
Completes CONFIRM'ed healer appointment

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: confirmAppointment
fields.description:
Confirms appointment

Can throw errors: "UNAUTHORIZED"

fields.name: declineAppointment
fields.description:
Declines PENDING appointment

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: createHealerService
fields.description:
Creates service for healer user

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: handleCohostInvitation
fields.description:
Handles cohost invitation for healer service

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: hideHealerService
fields.description:
Hides healer service, which is without Pending/Confirmed appointments

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'LINKED_TO_NOT_CANCELED_CLIENT_APPOINTMENTS'

fields.name: updateHealerService
fields.description:
Updates already created service for healer user

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: createHealerServiceDraft
fields.description:
Creates service draft for healer user

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: deleteHealerServiceDraft
fields.description:
Deletes service draft for healer user

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: createHealerServicePromoCode
fields.description:
Creates service for healer user

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: deleteHealerServicePromoCode
fields.description:
Deletes healer service promo code by id

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: updateHealerServicePromoCode
fields.description:
Updates already created service promo code for healer user

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: createHealerWidget
fields.description:
Creates widget

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: hideReview
fields.description:
Hides a review, making it invisible to regular users.

Only the healer (review recipient) can hide reviews.

Possible errors:
- 'UNAUTHORIZED': If the user is not authenticated or not the healer associated with the review.

fields.name: removeReview
fields.description:
Removes a review by ID.

Only the user who authored the review can delete it.

Possible errors:
- 'UNAUTHORIZED': If the user is not authenticated or not the author of the review.

fields.name: showReview
fields.description:
Unhides a review, making it visible again to regular users.

Only the healer (review recipient) can show previously hidden reviews.

Possible errors:
- 'UNAUTHORIZED': If the user is not authenticated or not the healer associated with the review.

fields.name: deleteHealerWorkPhoto
fields.description:
Deletes healer work photo. Work photos can be delete only through this mutation. If healer not own photo - returns false

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: deletePartnerWorkPhoto
fields.description:
Deletes partner work photo. Work photos can be delete only through this mutation. If partner not own photo - returns false

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: updateHealerUserProfile
fields.description:
Updates healer user profile and returns a full updated user

Fully rewrites received data

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: updateHealerWorkPhotos
fields.description:
Uploads and updates healer work photos. If user would have 6 photos after uploading - do nothing (returns empty array)

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: updatePartnerUserProfile
fields.description:
Updates partner user profile and returns a full updated user

Fully rewrites received data

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: updatePartnerWorkPhotos
fields.description:
Uploads and updates partner work photos. If user would have 6 photos after uploading - do nothing (returns empty array)

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: updateUserProfileImage
fields.description:
Uploads/updates profile image and returns an url

Accepts PURE base64 content (without 'data:image/jpeg;base64,' prefix)

If profile image exists - overwrite existed image

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: updateUserRole
fields.description:
Updates user sensitive information

Can throw error codes: 'BAD_USER_INPUT', 'INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR'

fields.name: updateUserSettings
fields.description:
Updates user sensitive information

Can throw error codes: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT', 'INCORRECT_CREDENTIALS_OR_NOT_EXISTS'

fields.name: nearestAvailableTime
fields.description: Returns nearest available time for CLIENT SIDE services page

fields.name: selectedAvailableTimes
fields.description: Returns selected available times for HEALER SIDE services edit page

fields.name: calculateAvailableTimeSlots
fields.description: Returns calculated available time slots for CLIENT SIDE

fields.description: retreat specific fields

fields.name: healingFormats
fields.description: transmission specific fields

fields.description:
Silent check for email existence

fields.name: getBusinessCategoryList
fields.description:
Returns a list of business categories

Available only for PARTNER role user

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: getChatById
fields.description:
Returns a chat by requested id

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: getChatList
fields.description:
Returns paginated chat list

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: getUnreadChatMessageCount
fields.description:
Returns overall unread messages count for authorized user

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: getClientAppointmentList
fields.description:
Returns a list of client appointments

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: getClientAppointmentListWithSelectedHealer
fields.description:
Returns a list of client appointments

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: getClientAppointmentRescheduleInformation
fields.description:
Returns corresponded field with information about client appointment reschedule availability

Works only with PRIVATE and NOT Cancelled client appointments

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: getPendingClientAppointmentCount
fields.description:
Returns the count of pending client appointments

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: checkFeatureFlag
fields.description: Get feature flag variant

fields.name: getHealerAppointmentList
fields.description:
Returns a list of healer appointments

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: getPendingHealerAppointmentCount
fields.description:
Returns the count of pending healer appointments

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: isReferralCodeValid
fields.description:
Silent check for referral code existence

Can throw errors: 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: generateRecurringSessions
fields.description:
Generates time slots for recurring sessions, which we should provide when create a GROUP session

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: getHealerServiceById
fields.description:
Returns a healer service by mongo id

Can throw errors: 'NOT_FOUND', 'BAD_USER_INPUT'

fields.name: getHealerWidget
fields.description: Returns a widget

fields.name: getHealingFormatList
fields.description:
Returns a list of healing formats

Available only for HEALER role user

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: getHealingTechniqueList
fields.description:
Returns a list of healing techniques

Available only for HEALER role user

fields.name: getHealthConditionList
fields.description:
Returns a list of healing techniques

Available only for HEALER role user

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.description: Returns a paginated list of HealerClient role users who was encountered by requested user

fields.description: Returns a paginated list of Healer role users who was encountered by requested user

Accessible without authorization

Accessible without authorization

Returns a list of records with users, who FOLLOW user from request context

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.name: getUserFollowingList
fields.description:
Returns a list of records with users, which is FOLLOWED by user from request context

Can throw errors: 'UNAUTHORIZED'

fields.description:
Provides a possibility to listen updates for new messages

Filters payload by authorized user context

Provides a possibility to listen updates for unread message count

Filters payload by authorized user context

Filters payload by authorized user context

Filters payload by authorized user context

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

types.name: __Type
types.description:
The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum.

Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name, description and optional `specifiedByURL`, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given `__Type` is.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Directive
types.description:
A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.

In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.
